text: Barrier of the Unknown () is a 1961 Soviet science fiction movie directed by Nikita Kurikhin.БАРЬЕР НЕИЗВЕСТНОСТИ It stars Vyacheslav Shalevich, Ella Sumskaya, and Nikolai Gritsenko. ==Actors== *Vyacheslav Shalevich — test pilot Sergei Fedorovich Baikalov *Ella Sumskaya — physicist Vera Borisovna Stankevich *Nikolai Gritsenko — deputy *Aleksandr Grave — Fedor Vasilyevich Sokolov *Vasily Makarov — test pilot Oleg Leonidovich Kazantsev *Fyodor Nikitin — Doctor Romashov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1961 science fiction movies Category:Soviet science fiction movies Category:Movies directed by Nikita Kurikhin
title: Barrier of the Unknown
